targets.expr:
(libvirt_domain_block_stats_capacity_bytes{domain="$vm"} / on (domain,target_device) group_left (mold_volume_type) libvirt_domain_block_meta{domain="$vm", mold_volume_type="ROOT"})
-
(libvirt_domain_block_stats_allocation{domain="$vm"} / on (domain,target_device) group_left (mold_volume_type) libvirt_domain_block_meta{domain="$vm", mold_volume_type="ROOT"})
rate(libvirt_domain_info_cpu_time_seconds_total{domain=~"$vm"}[1m]) / on (domain, instance, job) count(libvirt_domain_vcpu_cpu{}) by (instance, domain, job) * 100

list.definition: SELECT instance_name FROM vm_instance WHERE removed is NULL AND instance_name LIKE 'i-%'
list.label: vm
list.name: vm
list.query: SELECT instance_name FROM vm_instance WHERE removed is NULL AND instance_name LIKE 'i-%'
